name: 16 Grid: Squares Block Puzzle & Hexa Bricks Game
name_original: 16 Grid: Squares Block Puzzle & Hexa Bricks Game
description:
Welcome to 16 Grid block puzzle game.

16 Grid is a highly engaging and thought provoking puzzle game, with simple, line matching gameplay.

How to Play:

- Fill the grid with color blocks of different shapes
- Form complete rows and columns to clear a line
- Avoid getting stuck!

Features:

- Intuitive puzzle 1010 style gameplay
- 5 different game modes including hexa hexes, dynamite, 100, flow and more
- Play in light or dark mode
- Game center leaderboard
- Endless hours of gameplay
